backgroundInformationList.description: Declaration of Surplus Property - 13 Barberry Place

noticeDescription:
NOTICE is hereby given that in accordance with the City of Toronto's real estate disposal By-law, on February 15, 2023, a portion of the City-owned land located at 13 Barberry Place, legally described as a portion of PIN 10090-0046(LT), being part of Part Lot 1, Plan 4797, North York, Part 2, Expropriation Plan AT4797618, City of Toronto, was declared surplus. The property has a total area of approximately 215.4 m2 (2,318.55 ft2).  The City proposes to invite an offer to purchase part of the subject land from the adjacent owner.

 

The following City official has information about the proposed disposition: Mr. Myron Menezes, Tel: 416-338-3586, Metro Hall, 55 John Street, 2nd floor, Toronto, Ontario M5V 3C6. Enquiries may be made of the said official until the March 10th, 2023.
subheading: NOTICE is hereby given that in accordance with the City of Toronto's real estate disposal By-law, on February 15, 2023, a portion of the City-owned land located at 13 Barberry Place
title: Declaration of Surplus Property - 13 Barberry Place
topics: Sale of City Property/Real Estate > Proposed sale of City property
